title: What can I do after 12th science biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the students take biology group to become a doctor (admission through neet) Though there are many other courses viz. 1)BSc veterinary, through Neet or regional entrance exams. 2)BSc agriculture,horticulture,food scoences etc.through ICAR or regional entrance exams. 3)Aush course,through Neet. 4)Pharma course like d- pharmacy, b- pharmacy, pharma-D. 5) Bsc nursing admission based on +2 marks. 6)B.tech biotech,through regional entrance exams. Apart of the above professional courses,other UG courses are also there. Bsc biotechnology,Microbiology,zoology,chemistry, botony and other arts groups can also be chooses. Hope it helps. Keep smiling…..:)

There are lot of options after 12th frm PCB. You can go for NEET examination if you are interested in MBBS .2. You can do B sc nursing and after that M sc nursing. 3. You can opt pharmacy as your career . You have to do B.pharmacy . And at last you can do bachelors in science with microbiology , zoology and botany. Thanks I hope it helps you
